class ForumApplicationTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does the integration testing for the Forum application.

void contextLoads()

      • applicationStartTest

        @Test
void applicationStartTest()
        Test method added ONLY to cover main() invocation not covered by application tests.

      • createQuestion

        @Test
void createQuestion()
                    throws RecordNotFoundException
        This single test cover the below flows as part of the integration tests 1. Test whether getAllQuestions returns an empty list if there are no questions in the forum. 2. Test creation of a question. 3. Test creation of a reply to the question. 4. Test fetching of all the replies of a particular question. 5. Test fetching of all the questions. 6. Test usage of invalid question ID to store a reply to the question. 7. Test usage of invalid question ID to fetch question replies.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - - used to cover the throwing from createReply method.
